lead_paragraph: Two exhibitions at the American Folk Art Museum show the inner workings of a mind concerned with its own survival and that of the whole world.

headline.print_headline: Struggle and Survival, in Sheet Metal and Scraps
headline.main: In Sheet Metal and Scraps, Ronald Lockett Evokes Struggle and Survival

snippet: Two exhibitions at the American Folk Art Museum show the inner workings of a mind concerned with its own survival and that of the whole world....
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews works by Ronald Lockett in two exhibitions at American Folk Art Museum.
